rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control three or more Shrines, they get +2/+1 until end of turn instead.
notes: reworked: Was {3}{G/W} with ’At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 white Human creature token. If you control three or more Shrines, create two of those tokens instead.’
